Params: {3: 'Lucia begins to dive from the divergence point of the Deep M.I.N.D. she shares with Alpha.'}
{3: 'Because of the constraints of the connecting bridge, everything she does here will affect Alpha.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "I don't remember ever seeing this area. It seems like this is where my memory data has been sealed.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'When Lucia reaches out her hand, she suddenly feels an invisible force trying to keep her away.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "This is my memory. I can't back off now!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'With the invisible force gone, the Deep M.I.N.D. starts vibrating.'}
{3: 'Her surroundings begin to clarify, and images of her memories start showing.'}
